publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4402 Michael Matheson: Scottish Football Team - Kirin Cup Winners—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish football team on winning the Kirin Cup against Japan and Bulgaria; acknowledges the hard work put in by the players and staff, and hopes that this will be a springboard to further success in the coming years. Supported by: Richard Lochhead*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Andrew Welsh*
S2M-4402 Scottish Football Team - Kirin Cup Winners (lodged on 16 May 2006) Mr Brian Monteith*

S2M-4402 Michael Matheson: Scottish Football Team - Kirin Cup Winners—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish football team on winning the Kirin Cup against Japan and Bulgaria; acknowledges the hard work put in by the players and staff, and hopes that this will be a springboard to further success in the coming years. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Ms Sandra White, Mr Andrew Welsh, Mr Brian Monteith
S2M-4402 Scottish Football Team - Kirin Cup Winners (lodged on 16 May 2006) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-4402 Scottish Football Team - Kirin Cup Winners (lodged on 16 May 2006) John Swinburne*
